<Link id="l00009" /><CodeLine lineNumber="9"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// An implementation of the Swing Modulo Scheduling (SMS) software pipeliner.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00010" /><CodeLine lineNumber="10"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00011" /><CodeLine lineNumber="11"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Software pipelining (SWP) is an instruction scheduling technique for loops</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00012" /><CodeLine lineNumber="12"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// that overlap loop iterations and exploits ILP via a compiler transformation.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00013" /><CodeLine lineNumber="13"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00014" /><CodeLine lineNumber="14"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Swing Modulo Scheduling is an implementation of software pipelining</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00015" /><CodeLine lineNumber="15"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// that generates schedules that are near optimal in terms of initiation</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00016" /><CodeLine lineNumber="16"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// interval, register requirements, and stage count. See the papers:</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00017" /><CodeLine lineNumber="17"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00018" /><CodeLine lineNumber="18"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// &quot;Swing Modulo Scheduling: A Lifetime-Sensitive Approach&quot;, by J. Llosa,</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00019" /><CodeLine lineNumber="19"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// A. Gonzalez, E. Ayguade, and M. Valero. In PACT &#39;96 Proceedings of the 1996</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00020" /><CodeLine lineNumber="20"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Conference on Parallel Architectures and Compilation Techiniques.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00021" /><CodeLine lineNumber="21"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00022" /><CodeLine lineNumber="22"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// &quot;Lifetime-Sensitive Modulo Scheduling in a Production Environment&quot;, by J.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00023" /><CodeLine lineNumber="23"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Llosa, E. Ayguade, A. Gonzalez, M. Valero, and J. Eckhardt. In IEEE</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00024" /><CodeLine lineNumber="24"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Transactions on Computers, Vol. 50, No. 3, 2001</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00025" /><CodeLine lineNumber="25"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00026" /><CodeLine lineNumber="26"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// &quot;An Implementation of Swing Modulo Scheduling With Extensions for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00027" /><CodeLine lineNumber="27"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Superblocks&quot;, by T. Lattner, Master&#39;s Thesis, University of Illinois at</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00028" /><CodeLine lineNumber="28"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Urbana-Champaign, 2005</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00029" /><CodeLine lineNumber="29"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00030" /><CodeLine lineNumber="30"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00031" /><CodeLine lineNumber="31"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// The SMS algorithm consists of three main steps after computing the minimal</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00032" /><CodeLine lineNumber="32"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// initiation interval (MII).</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00033" /><CodeLine lineNumber="33"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// 1) Analyze the dependence graph and compute information about each</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00034" /><CodeLine lineNumber="34"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//    instruction in the graph.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00035" /><CodeLine lineNumber="35"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// 2) Order the nodes (instructions) by priority based upon the heuristics</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00036" /><CodeLine lineNumber="36"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//    described in the algorithm.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00037" /><CodeLine lineNumber="37"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// 3) Attempt to schedule the nodes in the specified order using the MII.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00038" /><CodeLine lineNumber="38"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00039" /><CodeLine lineNumber="39"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//===----------------------------------------------------------------------===//</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00118" /><CodeLine lineNumber="118"><Highlight kind="comment">/// Represents a dependence between two instruction.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00119" /><CodeLine lineNumber="119" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/swingschedulerddgedge"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">class </Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/swingschedulerddgedge/#afb31935c5b586aefe79b47d172a5746c">SwingSchedulerDDGEdge</a> &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00120" /><CodeLine lineNumber="120"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sunit">SUnit</a> &#42;Dst = </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">nullptr</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00121" /><CodeLine lineNumber="121"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sdep">SDep</a> Pred;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00122" /><CodeLine lineNumber="122"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> Distance = 0;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00123" /><CodeLine lineNumber="123"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00124" /><CodeLine lineNumber="124"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">public</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">:</Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00125" /><CodeLine lineNumber="125"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// Creates an edge corresponding to an edge represented by \\p PredOrSucc and</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00126" /><CodeLine lineNumber="126"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// \\p Dep in the original DAG. This pair has no information about the</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00127" /><CodeLine lineNumber="127"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// direction of the edge, so we need to pass an additional argument \\p</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00128" /><CodeLine lineNumber="128"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// IsSucc.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00129" /><CodeLine lineNumber="129" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/swingschedulerddgedge/#afb31935c5b586aefe79b47d172a5746c"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/swingschedulerddgedge/#afb31935c5b586aefe79b47d172a5746c">SwingSchedulerDDGEdge</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sunit">SUnit</a> &#42;PredOrSucc, </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sdep">SDep</a> &amp;Dep, </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">bool</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> IsSucc)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00130" /><CodeLine lineNumber="130"><Highlight kind="normal">      : Dst(PredOrSucc), Pred(Dep), Distance(0u) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00131" /><CodeLine lineNumber="131"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sunit">SUnit</a> &#42;Src = Dep.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sdep/#a03a2dc5f9f321a2ce28f5c641dfe5455">getSUnit</a>();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00132" /><CodeLine lineNumber="132"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00133" /><CodeLine lineNumber="133"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (IsSucc) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00134" /><CodeLine lineNumber="134"><Highlight kind="normal">      <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/std/#ab8424022895aee3e366fb9a32f2883cb">std::swap</a>(Src, Dst);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00135" /><CodeLine lineNumber="135"><Highlight kind="normal">      Pred.setSUnit(Src);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00136" /><CodeLine lineNumber="136"><Highlight kind="normal">    &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00137" /><CodeLine lineNumber="137"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00138" /><CodeLine lineNumber="138"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// An anti-dependence to PHI means loop-carried dependence.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00139" /><CodeLine lineNumber="139"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (Pred.getKind() == <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sdep/#a07333f8ba53e0454b7ec6365860c0732abe9561936346ab5c5e22fe544994b06e">SDep::Anti</a> &amp;&amp; Src-&gt;getInstr()-&gt;isPHI()) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00140" /><CodeLine lineNumber="140"><Highlight kind="normal">      Distance = 1;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00141" /><CodeLine lineNumber="141"><Highlight kind="normal">      std::swap(Src, Dst);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00142" /><CodeLine lineNumber="142"><Highlight kind="normal">      auto Reg = Pred.getReg();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00143" /><CodeLine lineNumber="143"><Highlight kind="normal">      Pred = SDep(Src, SDep::Kind::Data, Reg);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00144" /><CodeLine lineNumber="144"><Highlight kind="normal">    &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00145" /><CodeLine lineNumber="145"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00146" /><CodeLine lineNumber="146"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00147" /><CodeLine lineNumber="147"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// Returns the SUnit from which the edge comes (source node).</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00148" /><CodeLine lineNumber="148" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/swingschedulerddgedge/#ad81995fff228b0618a43adce97ba17a0"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sunit">SUnit</a> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/swingschedulerddgedge/#ad81995fff228b0618a43adce97ba17a0">getSrc</a>()</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword"> const </Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">&#123; </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> Pred.getSUnit(); &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00149" /><CodeLine lineNumber="149"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00150" /><CodeLine lineNumber="150"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// Returns the SUnit to which the edge points (destination node).</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00423" /><CodeLine lineNumber="423"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00424" /><CodeLine lineNumber="424"><Highlight kind="comment">/// A NodeSet contains a set of SUnit DAG nodes with additional information</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00425" /><CodeLine lineNumber="425"><Highlight kind="comment">/// that assigns a priority to the set.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00426" /><CodeLine lineNumber="426" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/nodeset"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">class </Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/nodeset/#a596e6f47c1c842668452419086d6c097">NodeSet</a> &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00427" /><CodeLine lineNumber="427"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/setvector">SetVector&lt;SUnit &#42;&gt;</a> Nodes;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00428" /><CodeLine lineNumber="428"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">bool</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> HasRecurrence = </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">false</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00429" /><CodeLine lineNumber="429"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> RecMII = 0;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00430" /><CodeLine lineNumber="430"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">int</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> MaxMOV = 0;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00431" /><CodeLine lineNumber="431"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> MaxDepth = 0;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00432" /><CodeLine lineNumber="432"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> Colocate = 0;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00433" /><CodeLine lineNumber="433"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sunit">SUnit</a> &#42;ExceedPressure = </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">nullptr</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00434" /><CodeLine lineNumber="434"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> Latency = 0;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00435" /><CodeLine lineNumber="435"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00436" /><CodeLine lineNumber="436"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">public</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">:</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00437" /><CodeLine lineNumber="437" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/nodeset/#a23b591c7cb04a054d9cafd9bf58e7757"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">using </Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/nodeset/#a23b591c7cb04a054d9cafd9bf58e7757">iterator</a> = <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/setvector/#a954de16c021e57fb3c8e8143bdb428ca">SetVector&lt;SUnit &#42;&gt;::const&#95;iterator</a>;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00438" /><CodeLine lineNumber="438"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00439" /><CodeLine lineNumber="439" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/nodeset/#a596e6f47c1c842668452419086d6c097"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/nodeset/#a596e6f47c1c842668452419086d6c097">NodeSet</a>() = </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">default</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00440" /><CodeLine lineNumber="440" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/nodeset/#a802a019a7c7dbb3c15f7ce000c74fae4"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/nodeset/#a802a019a7c7dbb3c15f7ce000c74fae4">NodeSet</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/nodeset/#a23b591c7cb04a054d9cafd9bf58e7757">iterator</a> S, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/nodeset/#a23b591c7cb04a054d9cafd9bf58e7757">iterator</a> <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/builtingcs-cpp/#abb2b3a60ccc38a28239e19a1646e0c8a">E</a>, </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/swingschedulerdag">SwingSchedulerDAG</a> &#42;DAG)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00441" /><CodeLine lineNumber="441"><Highlight kind="normal">      : Nodes(S, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/builtingcs-cpp/#abb2b3a60ccc38a28239e19a1646e0c8a">E</a>), HasRecurrence(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/basicaliasanalysis-cpp/#af6d5cafbdfc5313e65d990120021a3ec">true</a>) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00442" /><CodeLine lineNumber="442"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Calculate the latency of this node set.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00443" /><CodeLine lineNumber="443"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Example to demonstrate the calculation:</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00444" /><CodeLine lineNumber="444"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Given: N0 -&gt; N1 -&gt; N2 -&gt; N0</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00445" /><CodeLine lineNumber="445"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Edges:</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00446" /><CodeLine lineNumber="446"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// (N0 -&gt; N1, 3)</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00447" /><CodeLine lineNumber="447"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// (N0 -&gt; N1, 5)</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00448" /><CodeLine lineNumber="448"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// (N1 -&gt; N2, 2)</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00449" /><CodeLine lineNumber="449"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// (N2 -&gt; N0, 1)</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00450" /><CodeLine lineNumber="450"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// The total latency which is a lower bound of the recurrence MII is the</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00451" /><CodeLine lineNumber="451"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// longest path from N0 back to N0 given only the edges of this node set.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00452" /><CodeLine lineNumber="452"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// In this example, the latency is: 5 + 2 + 1 = 8</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00453" /><CodeLine lineNumber="453"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00454" /><CodeLine lineNumber="454"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Hold a map from each SUnit in the circle to the maximum distance from the</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00455" /><CodeLine lineNumber="455"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// source node by only considering the nodes.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00456" /><CodeLine lineNumber="456"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/swingschedulerddg">SwingSchedulerDDG</a> &#42;DDG = DAG-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/swingschedulerdag/#a461d411e76e02e7a4ec0ca56098540aa">getDDG</a>();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00457" /><CodeLine lineNumber="457"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/densemap">DenseMap&lt;SUnit &#42;, unsigned&gt;</a> SUnitToDistance;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00458" /><CodeLine lineNumber="458"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">auto</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/classes/node">Node</a> : Nodes)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00459" /><CodeLine lineNumber="459"><Highlight kind="normal">      SUnitToDistance&#91;<a href="/docs/api/classes/node">Node</a>&#93; = 0;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00460" /><CodeLine lineNumber="460"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00461" /><CodeLine lineNumber="461"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (</Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a> = 1, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/builtingcs-cpp/#abb2b3a60ccc38a28239e19a1646e0c8a">E</a> = Nodes.size(); <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a> &lt;= <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/builtingcs-cpp/#abb2b3a60ccc38a28239e19a1646e0c8a">E</a>; ++<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00462" /><CodeLine lineNumber="462"><Highlight kind="normal">      SUnit &#42;U = Nodes&#91;I - 1&#93;;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00463" /><CodeLine lineNumber="463"><Highlight kind="normal">      SUnit &#42;V = Nodes&#91;I % Nodes.size()&#93;;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00464" /><CodeLine lineNumber="464"><Highlight kind="normal">      for (const SwingSchedulerDDGEdge &amp;Succ : DDG-&gt;getOutEdges(U)) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00465" /><CodeLine lineNumber="465"><Highlight kind="normal">        SUnit &#42;SuccSUnit = Succ.getDst();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00466" /><CodeLine lineNumber="466"><Highlight kind="normal">        if (V != SuccSUnit)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00467" /><CodeLine lineNumber="467"><Highlight kind="normal">          continue;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00468" /><CodeLine lineNumber="468"><Highlight kind="normal">        if (SUnitToDistance&#91;U&#93; + Succ.getLatency() &gt; SUnitToDistance&#91;V&#93;) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00469" /><CodeLine lineNumber="469"><Highlight kind="normal">          SUnitToDistance&#91;V&#93; = SUnitToDistance&#91;U&#93; + Succ.getLatency();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00470" /><CodeLine lineNumber="470"><Highlight kind="normal">        &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00471" /><CodeLine lineNumber="471"><Highlight kind="normal">      &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00472" /><CodeLine lineNumber="472"><Highlight kind="normal">    &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00473" /><CodeLine lineNumber="473"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Handle a back-edge in loop carried dependencies</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00474" /><CodeLine lineNumber="474"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sunit">SUnit</a> &#42;FirstNode = Nodes&#91;0&#93;;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00475" /><CodeLine lineNumber="475"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sunit">SUnit</a> &#42;LastNode = Nodes&#91;Nodes.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/setvector/#a1a42c1ba878bd637f374197d05f0a97f">size</a>() - 1&#93;;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00476" /><CodeLine lineNumber="476"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00477" /><CodeLine lineNumber="477"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">auto</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &amp;PI : DDG-&gt;getInEdges(LastNode)) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00478" /><CodeLine lineNumber="478"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// If we have an order dep that is potentially loop carried then a</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00479" /><CodeLine lineNumber="479"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// back-edge exists between the last node and the first node that isn&#39;t</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00480" /><CodeLine lineNumber="480"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// modeled in the DAG. Handle it manually by adding 1 to the distance of</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00481" /><CodeLine lineNumber="481"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// the last node.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00482" /><CodeLine lineNumber="482"><Highlight kind="normal">      if (PI.getSrc() != FirstNode || !PI.isOrderDep() ||</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00483" /><CodeLine lineNumber="483"><Highlight kind="normal">          !DAG-&gt;isLoopCarriedDep(PI))</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00484" /><CodeLine lineNumber="484"><Highlight kind="normal">        continue;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00485" /><CodeLine lineNumber="485"><Highlight kind="normal">      SUnitToDistance&#91;FirstNode&#93; =</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00486" /><CodeLine lineNumber="486"><Highlight kind="normal">          std::max(SUnitToDistance&#91;FirstNode&#93;, SUnitToDistance&#91;LastNode&#93; + 1);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00487" /><CodeLine lineNumber="487"><Highlight kind="normal">    &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00488" /><CodeLine lineNumber="488"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00489" /><CodeLine lineNumber="489"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// The latency is the distance from the source node to itself.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00490" /><CodeLine lineNumber="490"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a1eb5609345b906d024fbf9e4bc1adc06a2d68d32ff95cd10b4899c2823ec28e97">Latency</a> = SUnitToDistance&#91;Nodes.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/setvector/#a2309608beb7af149f7bf6158319ecfdb">front</a>()&#93;;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00491" /><CodeLine lineNumber="491"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00492" /><CodeLine lineNumber="492"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00493" /><CodeLine lineNumber="493" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/nodeset/#aba49350c71f099c58053900c4250b417"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">bool</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/nodeset/#aba49350c71f099c58053900c4250b417">insert</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sunit">SUnit</a> &#42;SU) &#123; </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> Nodes.insert(SU); &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00494" /><CodeLine lineNumber="494"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00495" /><CodeLine lineNumber="495" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/nodeset/#a2af89163b823f4392432f17d2fa72926"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">void</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/nodeset/#a2af89163b823f4392432f17d2fa72926">insert</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/nodeset/#a23b591c7cb04a054d9cafd9bf58e7757">iterator</a> S, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/nodeset/#a23b591c7cb04a054d9cafd9bf58e7757">iterator</a> <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/builtingcs-cpp/#abb2b3a60ccc38a28239e19a1646e0c8a">E</a>) &#123; Nodes.insert(S, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/builtingcs-cpp/#abb2b3a60ccc38a28239e19a1646e0c8a">E</a>); &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00496" /><CodeLine lineNumber="496"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00497" /><CodeLine lineNumber="497" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/nodeset/#ae0917c65a91dcc5e8fb0f1960354b8c2"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">template</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &lt;</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">typename</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> UnaryPredicate&gt; </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">bool</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/nodeset/#ae0917c65a91dcc5e8fb0f1960354b8c2">remove&#95;if</a>(UnaryPredicate <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/option/option-cpp/#a04665169063c8ca1f2ea96c27fc7c2b2">P</a>) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00499" /><CodeLine lineNumber="499"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00500" /><CodeLine lineNumber="500"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00501" /><CodeLine lineNumber="501" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/nodeset/#a56b9083f6d85aec6325b90028372d2e2"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/nodeset/#a56b9083f6d85aec6325b90028372d2e2">count</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sunit">SUnit</a> &#42;SU)</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword"> const </Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">&#123; </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> Nodes.count(SU); &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00502" /><CodeLine lineNumber="502"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00503" /><CodeLine lineNumber="503" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/nodeset/#a88e3d5fd1132a51cdd9ab5f9c09e3a79"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">bool</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/nodeset/#a88e3d5fd1132a51cdd9ab5f9c09e3a79">hasRecurrence</a>() &#123; </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> HasRecurrence; &#125;;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00504" /><CodeLine lineNumber="504"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00505" /><CodeLine lineNumber="505" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/nodeset/#a9ea1466950ca6ed26b74695ac58aa954"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/nodeset/#a9ea1466950ca6ed26b74695ac58aa954">size</a>()</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword"> const </Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">&#123; </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> Nodes.size(); &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00506" /><CodeLine lineNumber="506"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00592" /><CodeLine lineNumber="592"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// Modulo Reservation Table. When a resource with ID R is consumed in cycle</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00595" /><CodeLine lineNumber="595"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// The number of scheduled micro operations for each slot. Micro operations</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00599" /><CodeLine lineNumber="599"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// Each processor resource is associated with a so-called processor resource</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00600" /><CodeLine lineNumber="600"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// mask. This vector allows to correlate processor resource IDs with</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00601" /><CodeLine lineNumber="601"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// processor resource masks. There is exactly one element per each processor</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00616" /><CodeLine lineNumber="616"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// Return M satisfying Dividend = Divisor &#42; X + M, 0 &lt; M &lt; Divisor.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00617" /><CodeLine lineNumber="617"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// The slot on MRT to reserve a resource for the cycle C is positiveModulo(C,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00618" /><CodeLine lineNumber="618"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// II).</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00619" /><CodeLine lineNumber="619"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">int</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> positiveModulo(</Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">int</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> Dividend, </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">int</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> Divisor)</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword"> const </Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">&#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00620" /><CodeLine lineNumber="620"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(Divisor &gt; 0);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00621" /><CodeLine lineNumber="621"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">int</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> R = Dividend % Divisor;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00622" /><CodeLine lineNumber="622"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (R &lt; 0)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00623" /><CodeLine lineNumber="623"><Highlight kind="normal">      R += Divisor;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00624" /><CodeLine lineNumber="624"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> R;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00625" /><CodeLine lineNumber="625"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00662" /><CodeLine lineNumber="662"><Highlight kind="comment">/// This class represents the scheduled code.  The main data structure is a</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00663" /><CodeLine lineNumber="663"><Highlight kind="comment">/// map from scheduled cycle to instructions.  During scheduling, the</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00664" /><CodeLine lineNumber="664"><Highlight kind="comment">/// data structure explicitly represents all stages/iterations.   When</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00665" /><CodeLine lineNumber="665"><Highlight kind="comment">/// the algorithm finshes, the schedule is collapsed into a single stage,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00666" /><CodeLine lineNumber="666"><Highlight kind="comment">/// which represents instructions from different loop iterations.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00667" /><CodeLine lineNumber="667"><Highlight kind="comment">///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00668" /><CodeLine lineNumber="668"><Highlight kind="comment">/// The SMS algorithm allows negative values for cycles, so the first cycle</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00669" /><CodeLine lineNumber="669"><Highlight kind="comment">/// in the schedule is the smallest cycle value.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00670" /><CodeLine lineNumber="670" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smschedule"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">class </Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smschedule/#adb1ca08e3e0b9e280451db1aefa88151">SMSchedule</a> &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00671" /><CodeLine lineNumber="671"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">private</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">:</Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00672" /><CodeLine lineNumber="672"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// Map from execution cycle to instructions.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00673" /><CodeLine lineNumber="673"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/densemap">DenseMap&lt;int, std::deque&lt;SUnit &#42;&gt;</a>&gt; ScheduledInstrs;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00674" /><CodeLine lineNumber="674"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00737" /><CodeLine lineNumber="737"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">bool</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> insert(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sunit">SUnit</a> &#42;SU, </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">int</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> StartCycle, </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">int</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> EndCycle, </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">int</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/nvptx/nvvmintrrange-cpp/#ac5804672fc0850438d63caec770647f8">II</a>);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00738" /><CodeLine lineNumber="738"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00739" /><CodeLine lineNumber="739"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// Iterators for the cycle to instruction map.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00740" /><CodeLine lineNumber="740" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smschedule/#ab877357d6d4a96d113e83608fe92fdc8"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">using </Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smschedule/#ab877357d6d4a96d113e83608fe92fdc8">sched&#95;iterator</a> = <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/densemap">DenseMap&lt;int, std::deque&lt;SUnit &#42;&gt;</a>&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/iplist">::iterator</a>;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00741" /><CodeLine lineNumber="741" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smschedule/#aaa25193b314a77b502f4efead3ee4d4a"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">using </Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smschedule/#aaa25193b314a77b502f4efead3ee4d4a">const&#95;sched&#95;iterator</a> =</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00742" /><CodeLine lineNumber="742"><Highlight kind="normal">      <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/densemap">DenseMap&lt;int, std::deque&lt;SUnit &#42;&gt;</a>&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectorimpl">::const&#95;iterator</a>;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00743" /><CodeLine lineNumber="743"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00744" /><CodeLine lineNumber="744"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// Return true if the instruction is scheduled at the specified stage.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00745" /><CodeLine lineNumber="745" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smschedule/#a6455dfea4b357536881c7df8d7ca46d1"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">bool</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smschedule/#a6455dfea4b357536881c7df8d7ca46d1">isScheduledAtStage</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sunit">SUnit</a> &#42;SU, </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> StageNum) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00746" /><CodeLine lineNumber="746"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smschedule/#a64379c9a0436bfd06da2e854c7fc9c33">stageScheduled</a>(SU) == (</Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">int</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">)StageNum);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00747" /><CodeLine lineNumber="747"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00748" /><CodeLine lineNumber="748"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00749" /><CodeLine lineNumber="749"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// Return the stage for a scheduled instruction.  Return -1 if</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00750" /><CodeLine lineNumber="750"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// the instruction has not been scheduled.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00751" /><CodeLine lineNumber="751" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smschedule/#a64379c9a0436bfd06da2e854c7fc9c33"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">int</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smschedule/#a64379c9a0436bfd06da2e854c7fc9c33">stageScheduled</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sunit">SUnit</a> &#42;SU)</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword"> const </Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">&#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00752" /><CodeLine lineNumber="752"><Highlight kind="normal">    std::map&lt;SUnit &#42;, int&gt;::const&#95;iterator it = InstrToCycle.find(SU);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00753" /><CodeLine lineNumber="753"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (it == InstrToCycle.end())</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00754" /><CodeLine lineNumber="754"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> -1;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00755" /><CodeLine lineNumber="755"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (it-&gt;second - FirstCycle) / InitiationInterval;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00756" /><CodeLine lineNumber="756"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00757" /><CodeLine lineNumber="757"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00758" /><CodeLine lineNumber="758"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// Return the cycle for a scheduled instruction. This function normalizes</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00759" /><CodeLine lineNumber="759"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// the first cycle to be 0</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00760" /><CodeLine lineNumber="760" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smschedule/#ac2afdd571841c61dc8f980fe3d6f4885"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smschedule/#ac2afdd571841c61dc8f980fe3d6f4885">cycleScheduled</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sunit">SUnit</a> &#42;SU)</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword"> const </Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">&#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00761" /><CodeLine lineNumber="761"><Highlight kind="normal">    std::map&lt;SUnit &#42;, int&gt;::const&#95;iterator it = InstrToCycle.find(SU);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00762" /><CodeLine lineNumber="762"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(it != InstrToCycle.end() &amp;&amp; </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;Instruction hasn&#39;t been scheduled.&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00763" /><CodeLine lineNumber="763"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (it-&gt;second - FirstCycle) % InitiationInterval;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00764" /><CodeLine lineNumber="764"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00765" /><CodeLine lineNumber="765"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00766" /><CodeLine lineNumber="766"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// Return the maximum stage count needed for this schedule.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00767" /><CodeLine lineNumber="767" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smschedule/#a336ecf423257d7f3b529f5817d9598c9"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smschedule/#a336ecf423257d7f3b529f5817d9598c9">getMaxStageCount</a>() &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00768" /><CodeLine lineNumber="768"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (LastCycle - FirstCycle) / InitiationInterval;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00769" /><CodeLine lineNumber="769"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00770" /><CodeLine lineNumber="770"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00771" /><CodeLine lineNumber="771"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// Return the instructions that are scheduled at the specified cycle.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00772" /><CodeLine lineNumber="772" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smschedule/#a9d33c5d7d0efea61cb68e2ce82f693ce"><Highlight kind="normal">  std::deque&lt;SUnit &#42;&gt; &amp;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smschedule/#a9d33c5d7d0efea61cb68e2ce82f693ce">getInstructions</a>(</Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">int</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> cycle) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00773" /><CodeLine lineNumber="773"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> ScheduledInstrs&#91;cycle&#93;;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00774" /><CodeLine lineNumber="774"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
